msbt.message: Here's the birthday prezzie I couldn't give you! And I have to say it again: HAPPY BIRTHDAY!!!!! I sent this as fast as I could! I hope you love, adore, and maybe even cherish it!
Here's the birthday prezzie I was going to give you, but your pockets were full. I really wanted to get something, you know, special? So I SUUUUPER hope you love it!
That birthday prezzie I wasn't able to give you? Here it is! , I hope your next year is full of all sorts of happiness, fun adventures, and excellent performances!
Your birthday party was SO FUN. I LEGIT hope when it's my birthday everybody can get together and celebrate. I attached the birthday cupcakes you got from the piñata! (I hope they aren't squished.)
Your b-day party was SO fun! Here are the cupcakes (yes, all of them) that you couldn't take with you! Pass them out to friends OR eat them all yourself! (Don't do that it's bad for you!)

I hope your b-day was fun! Here are the cupcakes you couldn't take with you. I sent them over as FAST as I could! I didn't want another deal like the last time I was in charge of the cupcakes! (YIKES!)
That's your name, right? HAHA! That cupcake you gave me was SO GOOD. I know this note's a little late, but I wanted to make sure you got your b-day prezzie! I hope you like it!
The cupcake you gave me was so sweet and delicious. I ate it in, I don't know, two bites? OM! NOM! Anyhoo, I attached your b-day prezzie to this note. B-T-dubs? HAAAPPY BIRTHDAAAY!!
The cupcake you gave me was TASTY DELISH! Thanks! I know it's a little late, but I've attached your b-day prezzie! I hope you like it as much as I liked that cupcake!
